Translations.Text: Hum ney (hazrat) musa ko kitab di aur inn kay peechay aur rasool bhejay aur hum ney (hazrat) essa ibn-e-marium ko roshan daleelen din aur rooh-ul-qudus say unn ki taeed kerwaee. Lekin jab kabhi tumharay pass rasool woh cheez laye jo tumhari tabiyaton kay khilaf thi tum ney jhat say takabbur kiya pus baaz ko to jhutla diya aur baaz ko qatal bhi ker dala
Yeh kehtay hain kay humaray dil ghilaaf walay hain nahi nahi bulkay inn kay kufur ki waja say enhen Allah Taalaa ney malaoon ker diya hai inn ka eman boht hi thora hai

Aur inn kay pass jab Allah Taalaa ki kitab inn ki kitab ko sacha kerney wali aaee halankay pehlay yeh khud (iss kay zariye) kafiron per fatah chahatay thay to ba wajood aajaney aur ba wajood pehchan lenay kay phir kufur kerney lagay Allah Taalaa ki laanat ho kafirion per

Boht buri hai woh cheez jiss kay badlay enhon ney apney aap ko baich dala woh inn kay kufur kerna hai. Allah Taalaa ki taraf say nazil shuda cheez kay sath mehaz iss baat say jal ker kay Allah Taalaa ney apna fazal apney jiss banday per chaha nazil farmaya iss kay baees ye log ghazab per ghazab kay mustahiq hogaye aur inn kafiron kay liye ruswa kerney wala azab hai

Aur jab inn say kaha jata hai kay Allah Taalaa ki utari hui kitab per eman lao to keh detay hain kay jo hum per utari gaee uss per humara eman hai. Halankay iss kay baad wali kay sath jo inn ki kitab ki tasdeeq kerney wali hai kufur kertay hain acha inn say yeh to daryaft keren kay agar tumhara eman pehli kitabon per hai to phir tum ney aglay anbiya ko kiyon qatal kiya
Tumharay pass to musa yehi daleelen ley ker aaye lekin phir bhi tum ney bachra pooja tum ho hi zalim

Jab hum ney tum say wada liya aur tum per toor ko khara ker diya (aur keh diya) kay humari di hui cheez ko mazboot thaamo aur suno! To enhon ney kaha hum ney suna aur na famani ki aur inn kay dilon mein bachray ki mohabbat (goya) pila di gaee ba sabab inn kay kufur kay. Inn say keh dijiye kay tumhara eman tumhen bura hukum dey raha hai agar tum momin ho
Aap keh dijiye kay agar aakhirat ka ghar sirf tumharay liye hai Allah kay nazdeek aur kissi kay liye nahi to aao apni sachaee kay saboot mein maut talab kero
Lekin apney kartooton ko dekhtay huye kabhi bhi maut nahi maangen gay Allah Taalaa zalimon ko khoob janta hai

Bulkay sab say ziyada duniya ki zindagi ka harees aey nabi! Aap enhin ko paayen gay. Yeh hirs-e-zindagi mein mushrikon say bhi ziyada hai inn mein say to her shaks aik aik hazar saal ki umar chahata hai go yeh umar diya jana bhi enhen azab say nahi chura sakta Allah Taalaa inn kay kaamon ko bakhoobi dekh raha hai
